events.message: We have successfully received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate. The resume details extensive development experience and relevant technical skills.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as engineer and developer found in the candidate's profile and cover letter.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process for the Software Engineer role to ensure smooth communication and follow-up.
The initial screening call with the candidate went very well; the candidate demonstrated good understanding of software development principles and relevant engineering experience.
Received a prompt and enthusiastic response from the candidate confirming availability for the next round of interviews and expressing strong interest in the engineering role.
Successfully scheduled the first technical interview with the engineering team for the candidate on May 10th, 2024 at 10:00 AM UTC.
